help.admin:
ğŸ”§ Administrator Help

Category Management:
/add\_category - Add new category
/edit\_category - Edit existing category
/delete\_category - Delete category
/categories - Show all categories

FAQ Management:
/add\_faq - Add new FAQ question
/edit\_faq - Edit existing FAQ question
/delete\_faq - Delete FAQ question
/faqs - Show all FAQ by categories

Requests and Statistics:
/requests [page] - Show list of all requests (with pagination)
/stats - Show bot statistics

Admin Rights:
/getadmin - Get administrator rights (admin chat only)

Request Processing:
â€¢ Incoming user requests appear with "Approve" and "Decline" buttons
â€¢ When approved - request is sent to students
â€¢ When declined - need to specify rejection reason
â€¢ Student answers come with "Confirm" and "Decline" buttons
â€¢ When confirmed - answer is sent to user
â€¢ When declined - student can fix answer or reject assignment

âš ï¸ Important Notes:
- Category deletion only possible if not used in requests or FAQ
- All actions are logged in the system
- When declining, always provide clear reason for users/students
